text: Perfect Weapon or The Perfect Weapon may refer to: * The Perfect Weapon (1991 film), starring Jeff Speakman * The Perfect Weapon (2016 film), starring Steven Seagal * The Perfect Weapon (2020 film), a documentary film about cyberfare and cyber spying * "Perfect Weapon" (song), a 2010 song by Black Veil Brides * Perfect Weapon (TV series), a British TV series for National Geographic * Perfect Weapon (video game), a 1996 video game for Windows and Playstation * Star Wars: The Perfect Weapon, a 2015 short story in the Journey to Star Wars book series
title: Perfect Weapon
